snippet.title: Dumb Ways: Free For All | Freezerville DLC Update
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD DUMB WAYS: FREE FOR ALL NOW ON META QUEST, NOW WITH QUEST 2 COMPATIBILITY! https://www.meta.com/experiences/dumb-ways-free-for-all/7763282913797845/

Flights to Freezerville are now boarding!! ✈️Just in time for the festive season, this FREE DLC is taking you to a snowy wonderland full of wacky challenges! Now with Quest 2 compatibility, Dumb Tours is opening up its chaotic vacations to more travellers than ever before.

Gear up for the next wild leg of your adventure – with a whopping 25 brand-new minigames, you'll be diving headfirst into an even crazier lineup of chaotic vacation activities, such as: 
🍦 Frosty Flavors – Catch ice cream and feed a hungry Bean!
🐧 March of the Snowmen – Use a fishing rod to line up penguin soldiers and defend against an army of snowmen!
🦭Balancing Act – Lure sea lions and test your skills stacking beach balls on their noses!

But wait, there’s more! We’re packing plenty of extras into this update:
👥Enjoy cross-region multiplayer functionality—connect and play seamlessly with friends across the globe
❄️ 5 new frosty Tours to explore
⛄ Updated current playlists featuring the new snow minigames
🌨️ A new extreme weather challenge: Blizzard!

So pack your bags and brace yourself for madness, with the Dumb Ways: Free For All, Freezerville update! 



---
Find us on social:

https://www.tiktok.com/@dumbwaystodie
https://www.instagram.com/official_dumbwaystodie
